subject: [Mhln] Autodesk software
body:
What is not in the open street is false, derived, that is to say, literature.

If one had but a single glance to give the world, one should gaze on Istanbul.

The weak can never forgive. Forgiveness is the attribute of the strong.

A blond in a red dress can do without introductions -- but not without a bodyguard.

The educated differ from the uneducated as much as the living from the dead.

If, after all, men cannot always make history have meaning, they can always act so that their own lives have one.

To know how to disguise is the knowledge of kings.

Impelled by a state of mind which is destined not to last, we make our irrevocable decisions

An appeal to fear never finds an echo in German hearts.

The fence around a cemetery is foolish, for those inside can't get out and those outside don't want to get in.

Fate is nothing but the deeds committed in a prior state of existence.

What provokes your risibility, Sir? Have I said anything that you understand? Then I ask pardon of the rest of the company.

A good title is the title of a successful book.
